questiontext.text:
Exercise

Calculate the moments of mass about \(O\) in each of the following cases:

  1. [[input:ans1]] \(\textrm{kg} \, \textrm{m}\) [[validation:ans1]] [[feedback:prt1]]
  2. [[input:ans2]] \(\textrm{kg} \, \textrm{m}\) [[validation:ans2]] [[feedback:prt2]]

generalfeedback.text:
The moment is given by \(\text{moment } = M \times d\) so we get:

  1. \(5 \times 8 = 40 \, \textrm{kg} \, \textrm{m}\)
  2. \( 5 \times 10 = 50 \, \textrm{kg} \, \textrm{m}\)

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.
